"...Xiao.": "Xiao! Wake up, Xiao! Everyone's waiting for you!"
"We can't go on without you! I don't care what happens to me, I don't even care if it destroys my body...!"
"...Sorry, I didn't mean that. There's no way you want to hear that."
"I don't want to die. I don't want to lose my body."
"More than anything, I want to be together with you. Because we promised..."
"...No. That's wrong too. That's another lie. I don't want to be with you just because we promised..."
"...I don't know how to put something like this into words. I don't know how to communicate this to you."
"But I want to be with you. I want to laugh together, to get angry, to fight... I want to see and do all kinds of things with you..."
"I want to walk together with you."
"Xiao, I want to be with you. Not as one single being, but as our own separate existences."
"So... please, Xiao... Please, I beg you..."
